## Line Map -- Endowment Asset Allocations
```{r libraries}
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)

```
Loading the Data
```{r data, echo = FALSE}
breakdown <- read.xlsx("C:/Users/zhiyu/Documents/Spectator/Endowment/endowment-1.xlsx", 
                    sheetName = "assets",
                    rowIndex = 1:16,
                    colIndex = 1:7)
```

```{r trying}
print(head(breakdown))

breakdownMelted <- reshape2::melt(breakdown, id.var='Financial.Year')
head(breakdownMelted)
```

Line Plot of Endowment Fluctuations for Columbia
```{r lineplot}
ggplot(breakdownMelted, aes(x = Financial.Year, y = value, col = variable)) + geom_line()
```
